005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathException;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
012
013import java.util.List;
014
015import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
016import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
017
018/**
019 * This functional interface provides a dispatch method for executing a function
020 * call.
021 */
022@FunctionalInterface
023public interface IFunctionExecutor {
024  /**
025   * Execute the provided function using the provided arguments, dynamic context,
026   * and focus.
027   *
028   * @param function
029   *          the signature of the function
030   * @param arguments
031   *          the function arguments
032   * @param dynamicContext
033   *          the dynamic evaluation context
034   * @param focus
035   *          the current focus
036   * @return a sequence containing the result of the execution
037   * @throws MetapathException
038   *           if an error occurred while executing the function
039   */
040  @NonNull
041  ISequence<?> execute(
042      @NonNull IFunction function,
043      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
044      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
045      @Nullable IItem focus);
046}
